articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: Texas measles outbreak reaches 90 cases; 9 cases in New Mexico - Ars Technica
articles.description: The Texas cases are largely in children. Sixteen cases have been hospitalized.

articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: RFK Jr. promptly cancels vaccine advisory meeting, pulls flu shot campaign - Ars Technica
articles.description: Kennedy is reportedly planning to remove agency vaccine advisers, too.
